legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: 中美没有、也不应该进入“新冷战”阶段，而是应该本着不冲突、不对抗、相互尊重、合作共赢的精神来处理双边关系。冷战思维不符合世界潮流。从长远来说，最后的结果是不符合或跟不上世界潮流的人或政策被世界潮流所淘汰，而不是世界潮流改变方向去适应它们。 https://t.co/KMqCVRkeqi

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: 世界上没有哪个国家愿意在中美之间选边站队，中方也从来不要求其他国家选边站队。相反，世界各国，包括中国、美国、欧洲国家，都应选择站在历史正确的一边，共同构建人类命运共同体。 https://t.co/3Ckn3XN2Rr

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: 美国要解决的根本问题，是能不能尊重中国人民追求美好生活的权利，能不能承认这个世界是多样的，不同的政治制度、文明、种族之间应和平共处，加强合作来共同面对挑战。美国如果能在这个问题上，有一个符合21世纪现实、符合世界发展潮流的理念转变，它会发现自己面前海阔天空。 https://t.co/EhgUJiAXvr

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: On #Xinjiang, I myself have been to Xinjiang more than once in recent years. I saw a very different picture from some fabrications on the media. Until very recently, the biggest threat to Xinjiang was terrorist attacks.

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: We do not start wars or use missiles/drones to fight the influence of terrorist and extremist ideology.

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.description:
@CNN Chief International Anchor. Host, @CNNi & @PBS's nightly global affairs program. https://t.co/ohAPPIq4pY & https://t.co/5CC4uxElpA

Hear the podcast: https://t.co/6MbmubLOY7
legacy.name: Christiane Amanpour

legacy.full_text:
Today President Biden had his first news conference and pledged that China would not become a superpower on his watch. 

In an exclusive interview, China's Ambassador to the US, @AmbCuiTiankai pushed back on the President, "We don't think this kind of approach is a solution." https://t.co/TZeSOaIV7p

In this fast changing world, we need joint efforts by all countries to build a community with a shared future. It's not a solution to divide the world into different camps or build confrontational military blocs.

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: I took an interview with @camanpour and shared my views on China-U.S. relations. As I said in the interview, we hope the Anchorage meeting last week will be the beginning of a long process of dialogue, communication, and hopefully coordination between the two sides. https://t.co/9hgVnmyXlR

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

value.string_value: Kissinger: More efforts required for China and U.S. to cooperate

legacy.description: like and subscribe.
legacy.name: YouTube

legacy.full_text: Let me echo Dr Kissinger's words on China Development Forum: Modern technology, global communications& global economy require China & the US begin ever more intensive efforts to work together, because world peace &prosperity depend on understanding btw us. https://t.co/roVnPY30th

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: On the flight back to DC from Anchorage, you can find  the trace of global warming impact on this planet. China and the U.S. can cooperate on the most demanding tasks such as climate change for the good of humanity. https://t.co/eDKmRk0yA1

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: No mutual respect, no mutual understanding, no mutual benefit. More mutual respect, more mutual understanding, more mutual benefit.

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: Just returned to DC. As the Chinese side said, the Anchorage dialogue in the past two days was candid, constructive and helpful. China and the U.S. have differences in many fields, but such differences only justify more effective exchanges and communication in the future.

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text:
Director Yang Jiechi and State Councilor Wang Yi meet with Chinese media after the China-U.S. high-level strategic dialogue https://t.co/mCiA5LcYSd via 
@cgtnofficial

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: Before the Anchorage meeting begins, I took an interview with the media and shared my expectations on the meeting. https://t.co/TRqVa9Tyi4

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: — Big question marks in the minds of the global community: Will the U.S. be a responsible stakeholder in global affairs? Will the U.S. come back with sustained commitment and contributions to multilateral cooperation?

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: Will the U.S. be ready & willing to respect other countries’ interests and listen to their voice? Many countries including U.S. allies have such questions. Some just don’t say it in public.

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

value.string_value: Beijing’s decision to improve Hong Kong’s electoral system will ensure its stability and the healthy development of democracy.
Opinion: In patriot-governed Hong Kong, ‘one country, two systems’ is assured

legacy.description: The South China Morning Post brings you news and analysis about Hong Kong, China and the rest of Asia. Get our app: https://t.co/f15xfjosWQ
legacy.name: South China Morning Post

legacy.full_text: The NPC’s decision to improve Hong Kong’s electoral system is ultimately for the long-term implementation of “one country, two systems”. Read my opinion piece with South China Morning Post https://t.co/T5INEQ1wWn via @scmpnews

legacy.full_text: The Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council said on Thursday that the improved electoral system paves the way for the city toward more robust development. #HKSAR https://t.co/u95UA6NDav

legacy.description: Former Chinese Ambassador to the US
legacy.name: Cui Tiankai

legacy.full_text: Premier Li Keqiang on China-US relations: Our two countries need to put more energy on their common ground and expand converging interests. I hope that China-US relations can be future-oriented, overcome obstacles and move in a positive direction. https://t.co/W2BoYt4lI2
